alert.note: Alert for Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 09 at 10:45AM PST until December 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a few hundredths to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will start out as snow this afternoon before transitioning to a wintry mix this evening and overnight. Highest confidence in freezing rain is along the stretch of I-84 between North Powder and Ladd Canyon south of La Grande.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained for Oregon by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com, or for Washington by visiting online at https://wsdot.com/travel.
